snippet.title: Boeing's new 747-8 Intercontinental: Same same, but different
snippet.description:
* Few feats of engineering are synonymous with an entire industry.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/16/travel/lufthansa-747-8-intercontinental/index.html

snippet.title: Boeing issues 747-8, Dreamliner engine icing advisory to airlines
snippet.description:
* Boeing has warned airlines to keep some 747-8 and 787 aircraft away from certain storms because of possible icing problems in engines.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/23/travel/boeing-airliner-icing-problem/index.html

snippet.title: El nuevo Boeing 747-8 es el avión más largo del mundo
snippet.description:
* (CNNGo) — La aerolínea alemana Lufthansa se ha convertido en la primera del mundo en adquirir la aeronave Boeing 747-8 Intercontinental, llamada la Reina de los cielos. Mide poco más de 76 metros desde la nariz hasta la cola, lo que lo ubica como el...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2012/05/03/el-nuevo-boeing-747-8-es-el-avion-mas-largo-del-mundo/

snippet.title: Wow! Making planes in the world's biggest building
snippet.description:
* Sprawled out before us sits the exterior of the world's biggest building by volume. They make airliners here. Big ones.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/26/travel/boeing-aviation-geek-factory-tour/index.html

snippet.title: World's largest airliner: Is bigger better?
snippet.description:
* Superjumbo, the world's largest passenger plane, has finally conquered the world's busiest airport.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/09/06/travel/superjumbo-atlanta-airport/index.html

snippet.title: Boeing's luxury offices in the sky
snippet.description:
* Donald Trump seems to have hit hard times. The unfortunate fellow has been forced to buy a second-hand 757 from Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen for a paltry $100 million -- though he did then coat every metal surface in gold.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/11/02/travel/boeing-business-jets-cnngo/index.html

snippet.title: Boeing through the ages: Planes that changed the way we travel
snippet.description:
* There must have been some pretty wide smiles on the faces of Boeing executives waking up in Dubai earlier this week.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/21/travel/boeing-through-the-ages/index.html

snippet.title: What will Airbus A380 fault mean for passengers and airlines?
snippet.description:
* The European Aviation Safety Agency has ordered checks for cracks in the wings of the Airbus A380, though it has stopped short of grounding the fleet. CNN examines some key questions about the aircraft and what it means for the passengers, the airlines and the manufacturers.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/02/08/world/europe/airbus-a380-qa/index.html
